virophage.core

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • virophage.util.Location

  • public class Location
extends java.lang.Object
    A Location represents the x & y coordinates of a cell.

    2014-05-6
    Version:
    1.0 (Alpha)
    Author:
    Max Ovsiankin and Leon Ren
